alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 9:08PM CDT until September 09 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Southeastern Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Southwestern Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Selden, or 17 miles southwest of Oberlin, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Thomas, southeastern Rawlins, Sheridan and southwestern Decatur Counties, including the following locations... Angelus, Leoville, Halford, and Seguin. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 74 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
